name: Lily Heidger
text: I love this Mellow Mushroom! The back patio is such a fun place to go out to eat, with the large oak tree going through the middle of the deck. I love the vegan options, and the hummus is my favorite!

name: Shane Patterson
text: I've eaten at several Mellow Mushroom locations and they are consistently good and thus location didn't let me down. We had amazing service and great food! Will definitely be back next vacation!

name: Duane Grogan
text: The meat pizza was great. It had a whole lot of meat and the perfect amount of sauce. The server was good very attentive.

name: Legion of Comics
text: As always whether at home or away, Mellow is a must! Always fresh and delicious. The St. Simon location has amazing out door eating as well. And very cool decor inside.

name: Glenda Nettles
text: It was awesome!! Our server was fantastic and the food wonderful. Will definitely be going back. Spinach artichoke dip was so delicious!

name: Lionel Deschaine
text: Incredible atmosphere, service, and pizza in a unique place built around the trees.  Great prices as well.  Highly recommend this for a nice evening with friends.

name: Samantha Green
text: Ordered only a gluten free pizza, asked for it to be a little crispy, otherwise gluten free crust can be soggy. Well, not only was the crust soggy and not crispy,  it was also cold. Literally seemed like the pizza was heated up just long …More

name: Eric Bailey
text: Terrible experience! Sat to a table outside with no server help for a good 15 minutes. Finally had to ask someone if we were going to have a server. A server finally comes to the table and says , “I guess I’ll be your server.” She never …More

name: Amy Nessler
text: Great outdoor bar, lot of TVs, fast service. You usually know what you're going to get at mellow mushroom and this was no exception!

name: Eric Thornton
text: Had an amazing meal the food was delicious and the service was beyond exceptional we will be back here again

name: Tom Fortenberry
text: Helpful staff. Food was great. It's a pizza place with a hippie flair.

name: Kevin McClain
text: They are doing patio seating only. Great service. Cold bear. We had a Greek salad and pretzel bites. Very good.

name: John Pacifico
text:
August 2020
Service sure changed while quality and cleanliness were not to be found this Saturday evening. The menus were disgusting to the touch during a pandemic one …More

name: Dennis Smith
text: Great pizza but but no one wearing masks. Not a safe place to dine.

name: Kyle Minichelli
text: I understand they are overreacting to the Coronavirus fake pandemic like everyone else is but are you open or not? Changes every single day. Man up or just stay closed. Food is decent but getting tired of recommending them to parties I am …More

name: Luke 1313
text: Good food and drinks but takes so long to get your food and service is slow

name: David Faulk
text: Great place to watch games with family & friends

name: Miguel Dehaney
text: It was awesome the atmosphere is perfect good service

name: Vic Bancroft
text: Mellow back deck for night dining in the village after bikes and beach . . .

name: Jennifer Dezzi
text: This is my favorite place for pizza and a beer. Mellow has one of the best beer selections in the area. The pizzas are great. I especially love the thin crust. They really have something for everyone.  I recommend the spinach artichoke dip and build your own pizza. Fun and friendly atmosphere that's great for the whole family.

name: James Himes
text: Amazing atmosphere with beautiful design and great food. We had a large group and Samantha handled it very well and was extremely professional throughout the night. It's always nice to go to a restaurant with experienced service to take …More

name: Brooks Landscaping
text: Great food. Awesome environment.

name: Keith Ertl
text: Mandy and Bob should be experienced by all!

name: Laurie hatch
text: Always the best...beer, pizza.

name: Ginny Shelton
text: The Buffalo chicken dip is amazing! Family friendly environment.

name: Vincent Schmutzler
text: Amazing back porch eating area!

name: Shinemy LIGHT
text: Great Food. Good Service

name: Sue R
text: One of the few places on the island that actually features craft beer. Create your own pizza or salad, or order a standard one! Great hot pretzels--tough to eat just one.

name: Randy Settle
text: Delicious pizza with a awesome twist to it, huge slices almost reminded me of New York style pizza. Good prices and the sizes are well worth the price as well, We had the great white and house special

name: Laura Lynch
text: They have very good pizza! I haven't tried anything else yet but I will. I love their very unique décor. The kids really love it to. The tree on the deck is just gorgeous. As a child I went there when the restaurant was called Blanche's. …More

name: Jon Coen
text: Great pies, cold beer,good staff!

name: Maximillian J Eugene
text: Great place to eat.. lovely staff

name: liza Larkins
text: They really care about their customers. I personally saw them go the extra mile for a customer to make the customer

name: William Keane
text: I love this place my beer was cold and the holy shitake pie pizza...Holy bat crap batman that was good!!! Everything.... the crust...the pie...the napkin with the pizza juices. My son loved the pepperoni pizza...heck I wish I could tell you more about the rest however I am still going to order that Holy Shitake Pie AGAIN!...

name: Melinda Martin
text: My first experience was a bit of a wash because our waiter messed up all 3 orders at our table, was never around and another waiter refilled our drinks. The food was good though. A week later my friend wanted to meet there. Totally …More

name: Susan Dunagan
text: Groovy atmosphere with a trippy good food and service.

name: William Yarbrough
text: Great food! Great service! Staff was friendly and attentive. The back deck has a great atmosphere to enjoy your meal!

name: Marion Tyre
text: I have always appreciated the large "tap beer" selection at Mellow Mushroom no matter which location. This location didn't' disappoint in that area nor in their happy hour specials and food quality. …More

name: Breanne
text: Happy hour, great prices for an inbetween dinner. The best selection of craft beers on tap. Some of the best local cider I have had in a long time. Would give a 5 stars but each time we went in we had to wait for the bartender to clear off the bar for a spot to sit.

name: Rebecca Muir
text: Tried the mushroom pizza for the first time and loved it! No red sauce, which I think is overly aggressive. Pretzels are delicious. Happy hour drinks are good, too.

name: Frank Dries
text: We loved this indoor/outdoor pizza restaurant in St Simons Island. They have a wide variety of pizzas that all look and taste amazing. The staff is friendly and attentive. The outdoor setting on the patio that surrounds a huge tree and is …More

name: Sherna Lott
text: Our pizza was delish! The waiter quickly corrected an error on our bill and was super apologetic! I appreciated that! This is a great spot for non-seafood fare on the island!

name: Randall Warner
text: We should have known when we pulled up at 1:45 and the parking lot was a ghost town... I had to stick my head in and make sure they were open. They were out of our first 3 beer choices. The beer list was printed on printer paper, why not …More

name: Terry Teston
text: Best Pizza Ever... my wife loves it ..

name: Bill Brannon
text: Great pizza, a decent assortment of draft beers. Attentive staff. Good for families and couples.

name: Robert Crain
text: Good food good atmosphere friendly  folks.

name: Jason Ross
text: Great pizza, pretzel bites and salads

name: Paul Higginbottom
text: Good as other locations I've been, friendly service. Nice building!

name: Anthony Wood
text: By far one of the most beautiful locations I've had the pleasure of dining at. The open bar connects the inside and outside dinning area very well. The serving staff are very friendly and the food is reasonably priced. All in all I highly recommend that you visit while you are on the island.

name: Jeff Vaverchak
text: Very good, fresh and delicious.  Friendly and great service, I'd def. go again

name: Shelley Wheeler
text: Fun atmosphere and the beer cheese dip is awesome

name: Kelz
text: Personal size pizza was perfect size. Some of the best pizza I’ve had.

name: Ghost Reviews
text: The waitress took forever was constantly hanging out outside instead of taking orders had to ask three other waitresses to help us service sucked but food was good

name: Brian O'Sullivan
text: Really good selection of beers on tap to choose from, as well as various bottles/cans that are available.

name: Abby McCook
text: Good pizza.  Nice staff.  Be careful when going to it.  We went right by it and had to turn around.

name: Michael Lucas
text: Good atmosphere, good food. Not authentic Italian but still good. Great variety in selection.

name: Martha Collette
text: Our group loves to meet here. Staff is very attentive to our happy hour requests.  Always smiling

name: Chris G
text: Laid back atmosphere, wide array of food to please groups. Good drink list. Had kind of a hard time finding it with Google maps but it just told me to turn too soon. Would definitely be good with eating here again.

name: Cas Jones
text: Excellent food and great selection of pizzas and subs.  My picky eater said it is his favorite restaurant.  Only drawback is it gets very busy at for dinner.

name: David T-G
text: Always a great place to go :-)  Love the happy hour meatballs as a meal themselves!

name: Amy Warren
text: Good pizza as always. Caesar pie is my favorite. Always happy with the large tap beer selection which usually includes a good local selection. Best spot is out on the back deck under the live oak. If you can snag it the couches next the the fireplace are the best. Great for families as well.

name: Zac Bitzer
text: Great food and service. Staff catered to everything we needed. Come from out of town and wanted to watch playoff hockey. They put it on the TVs and turned the sound up for us. We had a large group and everything was great.

name: Holly Thornton
text: Excellent service great atmosphere❤

name: Lindy T. Cofer
text: Had so much fun with family there yesterday.  Delicious!

name: Serena Latorre
text: This was awesome. I had a salad and it was so large I couldn't finish it. A large amount of food for the whole family and reasonable pricing for the amount of food you receive.

name: Mary Wright
text: Absolutely just perfect pizza.

name: Q Carothers
text: My favorite place on the island

name: Angelo Bonito
text: Great service. Pizza is good, but our slices weren't very hot when served.

name: Daleene Parton
text: Before going in we wanted to make sure that it was ok to bring our two Boxers.  We are traveling and was looking for a place that was dog friendly. Being greeted promptly we were assured that the kids could come in!  We got a table on the …More

name: Mikey Brinson
text: Pizza is perfect. Service is above and beyond! Atmosphere is definatly a 10/10

name: raymond mills
text: Good food but service wasn't that good outside

name: teresa jay
text: Omg! We had the best waiter. I'm sorry that I don't remember your name! But don't stop adding a smile to your customer's face. This was my family first time eating here. The food was GREAT! We live in Warner Robins, but had traveled to …More

name: Michael Schutt
text: JJ did a get job serving us, the pizza was excellent,  and a great atmosphere.

name: Tara P
text: Delicious food. Excellent service. Good prices with generous portions.

name: Dan Wyatt
text: Such a unique twist to a pizza place. Best pizza I have ever had. There are many entrees available on there menu but haven't been able to stray away from the pizza. The service was great and the atmosphere there cannot be any better. Highly recommended

name: Marcos Lopez
text: Hana was a great waitress, went for my grandson's birthday. Food was great and hot. Management turned on outside fans for us.  Made our day.

name: Daniel Zynda
text: Best dough, generous toppings. Bottled beer is priced too high

name: Daryl Langford
text: Great food! The staff was friendly.  The only thing I want to mention is the chairs are a bit uncomfortable after sitting for awhile with no cushion. Still a great experience!

name: Dennis Merriman
text: Had a great time. Good food and drinks.

name: R Harris
text: Food was good  .  Service excellent

name: Ciera Lynch
text: Went here for the first time close to closing time but they were still happy to help, too much dough in the stromboli, not enough toppings.

name: Jennifer D
text: Good atmosphere and great food and beer!

name: Jenna Wylie
text: Beautiful place and great food!

name: Tom Conner
text: Good example of this chain. Mushroom soup is the best!

name: Jasmine Corrine
text: Awesome food, wonderful service. Try the sangria!

name: Robert Joiner
text: Pizza is not my favorite,  but went for the grands.

name: Marcin Szala
text: For their style of pizza very good, with good selection and a comprehensive drinks menu. On our first visit all was great. On the second we waited 1h45min for our pizza, and we have not been told that this is the wait. With a small child …More

name: Sam vanEeden
text: Good pizzas and other food items great beer selection. Child and pet friendly. I love to hang out here.

name: Sarah Wiroll
text: It would be better if they could just get your order correct. Pizzas are never correct. Have fun trying to get a simple meat and cheese only calzone. We have gone with people with allergies and that wasn’t taken seriously and they were …More

name: Jerry Medlar
text: Great pizza (vegan options), friendly servers, quick service, nice atmosphere

name: C Dubbya
text: Service was good, salad was good. I'll reserve a full review when we go back for more than just a quick lunch bite.

name: Nihilly
text: Their liquor selection is pretty good, and the staff are okay as well, I ended up not trying the food because of an old dude at the bar who was rude to staff and pretty much anyone else that talked to him who sat next to me. The atmosphere in there was good though.

name: Samantha M
text: We are on vacation, decided to order pizza for pickup here since we’ve had good experiences from other Mellow Mushroom pizza places in the past. Ordering online was easy and quick, was disappointed they don’t offer delivery at this location …More

name: Chris Wood
text: Great little pizza joint, love the pretzels and stone baked pizza...not bad wings either. Nice atmosphere with the open wall into the tree canopy and out door seating....the only downside to having really young servers is they love to chat …More

name: Arno Wehr
text: Meat balls are awesome. Fun place.

name: Alexya BT
text: Loved it!! Pizza was amazing and service was great😁

name: me Perez
text: I used to love this place. This time around I was seated and forgotten until a young lady after about. 20 mins waiting came over to ask if someone came over...when qe responded no she immediately took charge and bought us drinks and took …More

name: DeArman Norman
text:
5 stars for Blanche
Keep Live Oaks and Live Music alive
Bring back tortilla soup for fall please~

name: Mercy Moreno
text: Great staff, good food. They have dog friendly area.

name: Fun Traveler
text: We sat down to eat at 6:30 with four children under age of 10.  We didn't order any drinks from the bar and only ordered pizzas.  We were walking out at 8:15.  It took over an hour just to get our food. While they were busy they weren't …More

name: L. Wilson
text: Super cool patio-merging-into-bar area

name: Rebecca Martinez
text: Food was good, service was excellent. Server was very nice and friendly. Came for a visit with my dad so we tried this place out. We were both surprised and happy with our experience .

name: Kristen Brissey
text: We love the back porch area! It's beautiful back there and a nice space for parties. Very relaxing setup. The servers are also very helpful and nice.

name: Taresa L Klentzman
text: My nephews bday party was held here today we had a blast. There wings were good. I've had better though. What was weird  to me is that they had no French fries and they were out of sangria. They said they mix it with peach snops and rum …More

name: Anne Sartain
text: I love this place. Great atmosphere and very friendly staff!

name: John Littlefield
text: Every Mellow Mushroom is decorated differently but the pizza's are all the same, delicious everywhere. The crust is perfect every time. We always get the Gourmet White which I highly recommend. They have a knack for hiring great staff; they look like they have some interesting creative career outside work.

name: Ivy Wesson
text: Man there pizza is so good. Great service.

name: Tim Mitchell
text: These people are idiots. We ordered 5 pizzas 2 hours before pickup. They gave the order to another customer. Now we have no pizza. Idiots.

name: justin maslanka
text: My coworkers and I were in town for a conference and we thought we might check out mellow mushroom's trivia night. When we got there we were sadly informed they hadn't officially started doing it yet. Our waitress Muffin went out of her way …More

name: Gary Chesla
text: Great pizza and a good place to grab a fast bite.

name: Gonzo4 Lety
text: Meat pizza was good ..server was helpful

name: MIKE2AD
text: Good pizza fun place

name: Anna Marie Cox
text: When you are gluten free and dairy free and you NEED some pizza.... This is the spot! Deliciousness 😁

name: Samantha Reynolds
text: Great restaurant to go to for happy hour. They have pretzels meatballs in to dollar slices during  happy hour!   I have a great outside deck to sit on with an awesome tree that the deck is built around plus you can stroll off the back deck right into the local ice cream and candy store

name: Wm Barnett
text: Mellow Mushroom just does pizza right.

name: Adam Hefner
text: Great atmosphere. Good food even though a chain. Outdoor seating is great

name: Gerry Walton
text: Our 4th vacation to St. Simons, but our first time eating at Mellow Mushroom.  The Island has so many wonderful and unique restaurants, so we had no desire to eat at any "chain" establishments.  At a friends insistence we went and loved it! …More

name: Brice Tomlinson
text:
Yummy spot! Cool deck, nice staff, We were too busy talking so we actually were the last out the door though like most places will give you some awkward stares as it gets close to close time, they just let us enjoy our night and time.
Just like all mellows, food is fantastic!

name: Jillian Noble
text: Dough is really good! Plenty of great options for toppings.

name: Brenda Bonati
text: Some of The best pizza ever.

name: Euan Munro
text: Had a nice lunch with a friend here out on the deck. Wait staff were friendly, but it took quite a long time to get our pizza, even though it was not that busy (Saturday lunch time). Pizza was great when it arrived, nice fresh veggies, and good marinara sauce for dipping.

name: Arielle Payne
text: Great service. Great food. Open late👌🏽

name: Gus Lopez
text: Love this place sitting out back under a 100 year old oak listening to live music on Saturday nights! Can’t beat it!

name: Roland Lavoie
text: good food

name: Judy Benedict
text: Fun spot in St Simons. Pizza & salads just as great as other locations.

name: Chris Johnson
text: The mighty meaty was great

name: Mitchel Miller
text: My wife and I happened to come in when they had live music, it was a very welcome surprise. Everyone was very friendly and the food was excellent.

name: Matt Frick
text: Great atmosphere. Great food. Great service.

name: Debby Barnett
text: Very good food, awesome atmosphere

name: Sala Downey-Cox
text: Great service and atmosphere, they were out of a gluten free pizza, which was our reason for trying them, so if you need the gf, be sure to check when you go in.

name: Jared Dana
text: Get the Mighty Meaty pizza and the Sweet Chilli chicken wings. You won't be disappointed.

name: J Lehman
text: Amazing pizza, great setting and atmosphere and exceptional service. Our server Austin was fantastic, he was very polite, answered all our questions and was very enjoyable to chat with.  He also offered great recommendations for our vacation both here and in Savannah. We will be returning due to his experience.

name: Bryan Herbert
text: Great service, atmosphere, and food... Highly recommend the vege calzone (add chicken) with a side of beer cheese ... You can thank me later

name: Sala Gwen
text: Great service, out of gluten free pizza crust...

name: Jim Weldy
text: Food is great, service normally very good.

name: Harvey Specter
text: This location is the best my favorite one I've been to. Good food and great service every time.

name: Emma Krull
text: Great service and fun atmosphere! We just moved to SSI 3 months ago and it’s my favorite pizza so far. The subs and desserts are good too!!!

name: Julie V
text: This was my families favorite place to eat while visiting Saint Simon.  The atmosphere, the food and the staff were absolute perfection. I don't eat chicken or beef meat from restaurants and loved all there veggie options.  My husband definitely eats meat from any restaurant and he said the food was incredible.

name: Xyla Dee
text: Love the atmosphere and beer selection.

name: Shawana -
text: As always loved the food and staff was wonderful

name: Conor Kendrick
text: Coming from a Chicagoan...pretty good pizza.

name: Jon Kinney
text: Food was awesome. The service was slow and not good.

name: Scott Pyle
text: Great food...good beer!

name: Jason Corley
text: Friendly Staff , Great Atmosphere

name: Mark Maxwell
text: Always good

name: jason styron
text: Awesome Monday fun day at Mellow Mushroom st. Simons

name: Paul Quella
text: Always good at MM!

name: Susan Madden
text: Good food. Too hard to hear t.v. and game

name: Carol Fiorvanti
text: Crowded but food is good

name: Jesica R.
text: Always Fantastic!!

name: Steven Eastep
text: 1 hour to make a carry out pizza.  Asked how long it would take for a party of 4 they said we could be seated right away and have a pizza in about 30 min. They quote said people sitting in have priorities over carry out customers.  Your …More

name: Omron Tamari
text: First time to this establishment. Got seated quickly and overall service was good. Waited for sometime before discovering that our meals were burnt and being remade. …More

name: donagreg99
text: People can be real pizza snobs. Having said that, we like their pizza. Maybe not the best I've had but it's way up there. Good staff and beer selection. We like to go there for happy hour. Can't beat it!  Great atmosphere and plenty of T.V.'s for game day. Also one of our favorite bands plays there on a regular basis. Give it a try.

name: Melissa Gulledge
text: Good food. Was a little shocked by the paper straws, but it didn't make much of a difference.

name: Olivia Keena
text: Great experience, super great waiter!

name: Scott Blesch
text: Very good food! Nice outside patio.

name: Lisa Lopez
text: Hannah was an excellent server food was wonderful as always.

name: Rebecka Lytle
text: The fam and I LOVE to go to this place just about every thursday. Love the outdoor atmosphere and we also get to enjoy the company of our loving k9 pup. They bring him water as well! The service has always been impeccable no matter who we …More

name: Michelle Woods Nelson
text: Great service, good food

name: Nikki Crumity
text: My favorite pizza joint! The customer service is out of this world! Our server, Anton, took great care of us, and was very helpful with answering questions asked by our daughter. I am planning a girls night out here soon! I LOVE M.M! Go try them!

name: Shawn Mangram
text: Food and service was good, no wait time

name: Robert Miranda
text: Finally a great place with awesome service and good food. Our waitress Reilly was outstanding. It got busy after our arrival and her superb service was constant. After dealing with terrible service at Brogens and Iguanas we were finally treated right. They even made sure the football ge we wanted was on. Thank you.

name: Natalie Holmes, MSPH
text: Omg one of the best places to eat off the pier❤️❤️❤️

name: vicente archbold
text: Great service, ask for Kevin he is the best server

name: Brittani Richard
text: Wonderful food with plenty of gluten free, vegetarian, and even vegan options.  My kids loved the food as much as we did!

name: Christophe 'Frog' Starling
text: Hella damn good. Never got a sandwich before cause i usually get pizza.. It's was awesome.. Service was tip top & excellent!!!

name: Max Kahlhamer
text: Unique pizza choices for the brave, or the old standby's for the less adventurous. A plethora of taps, both fixed and seasonally rotating

name: Josie Universe
text: Went to participate in a NKGC event and enjoyed a really good calzone and even better service. A++

name: Libby Hartley
text: Love Mellow! Happy Hour is great to get $1 pretzels, bruschetta, & meatballs and $2 slices of pizza. Great for a midday (or late night) snack!

name: Alec Smith
text: Cannot express how happy we have been with our experience here. Amanda was very knowledgeable and courteous. Our entire group is vegan, this place has everything a vegan could ask for and more. Come here and enjoy the food!

name: Irene Bates
text: Wonderful baked wings. Terrific pretzels.  Use whole wheat flour with much more flavor than white. Love the atmosphere, especially the outdoor deck.  Our grandkids beg to go there for lunch during every visit.

name: Preston Farley
text: The food is very tasty and different than what you can find in this area, assuming you move beyond Pizza.  The beer selection is very good for a pizza joint.  Parking is tough, but that's everywhere on the island.  A little pricey, but also normal for the island.

name: Mike Barber
text: Pretty cool outdoor seating area/bar with an old oak tree growing in the middle of the deck. Great beer selection and the food is always good.

name: Thomas Dasher
text: Good pizza. Visited the week of the 4th, so it was packed. Good service. Spent almost $40 on a large pizza and 4 drinks plus tip.

name: Bob Walb
text: My wife and I had lunch specials. Me: two slices cheese pizza; She: a cheese slice and "small salad".  The piece was tasty and the salad, large and delicious. Our lunch companions went again today and had my wife's choice.  They, too, enjoyed the salad with pizza slice.

name: Jay Rush
text: meh they're better near universities.

name: Michael Haigh
text: Staff is always super nice, food is quick, and prices are fair, best experience is to dine in but takeout is an option

name: Angela Trevino
text: The mushroom pizza is super Yummm!! Beautiful dining on the back patio. Excellent service! Don't see the pizza you love? They will make your favorite recipe!!

name: Martha Collette
text: Food good service not, takes food too long to come.

name: Patrick Knowlton
text: Great time.

name: Blue Charlie
text: Excellent 👍😀

name: LaRue Mahoney
text: Great place for dining as the food was fabulous!

name: Paul Lockyer
text: Good food slow kitchen. If you're not in a hurry the food is worth the wait. The atmosphere is very casual but the menu items are generally better than most other places on Saint Simons that serve similar products.

name: Sara Ramtinfar
text: Very casual place. Nothing special. The food was just not bad! no more! not going here anymore.

name: Win C
text: The meatballs are the best. Thank you.

name: John Kinchen
text: Good food and good be people !

name: Jennifer Walters
text: The wait is usually pretty long on weekends and evenings as expected, but even after ordering it seems to take quite a while.  Pricing for two slices of pizza seems a bit steep.  Avocado hoagie could be put together a little better as it's …More

name: Torrie Brickley
text: Traveling through and a local suggested we try mellow mushroom as january is happy hour prices all month... price of beer did not reflect happy hour prices... and yes we asked …More

name: Steve Sutherland
text: Had the meatball appetizers, great. Pizza was very good.

name: Amy McKinney
text: Delish pizzas, great atmosphere, quick & friendly service!

name: Robin
text: Staff very friendly.  Food fresh and hot, order was perfect.

name: jeff keefe
text: Tree growing through the deck is super cool. The waiter with the deep voice was excellent. Pizza was excellent.

name: lindsey wirht
text: Great food & service! The tree on the back patio is so awesome. We loved it!

name: Amanda McGee
text: Always enjoy it.

name: Stacey Mcfarland
text: Nice ambience, friendly staff. A little slow on service.

name: Susan Friday
text: Great place to eat. Had an issue with the kitchen but the manager paid for our meals. Best customer service in a long time.

name: Phil Arbeit
text: Parking is always a challenge.  Food is always great.  Service is usually terrific.  Prices are giid

name: Karon Marballie
text: It a great place for family friendly with live music and great service. The food was delicious.

name: inez Is
text: Fabulous snacks, amazing beer selection & friendly staff! Don't rush though, Mellow. Lol

name: Scott Workman
text: This location has great food and a great drink selection with a very unique atmosphere. Highly recommend for anyone visiting St. Simon's Island.

name: Richard S. Bailey Jr.
text: Great food & service

name: DS R
text: Had a takeout pie. The atmosphere looked great and the staff was very friendly. Our pizza was the house special and was delicious. Much better than our mellow back home.

name: Michelle Grovner
text: This is my first visit to the yellow mushroom and the service is awesome!. The food and the atmosphere is great. I will definitely be back!

name: Cynthia Edmonds
text: Good pizza, great setting, happy hour specials, but needs working heaters for outdoor seating. Service was inconsistent during two visits: the waitstaff service was very slow, but management was eager to please.

name: Kristy Seabolt
text: First time visiting and was pleasantly pleased. Loved the food and the atmosphere

name: Jamey Johnson
text: Awsome 🍕, huge bar and spinach artichoke dip is the bomb! Lastly definitely order the Moscow mule and thank later

name: Ken Price
text: Our family loves this place. Great food and service.

name: Heavy Metal Rewind
text: The restraint was a good one, positioned by the beach and plenty of seating. Not only did they have good seating and such, but they also had gluten free pizzas for my brother to eat!

name: Jennifer Zwicker
text: This mellow location leaves a lot to be desired. Bad management. Came to eat, waited 20 minutes, had to ask repeatedly when a table would be ready. Some clown booked a wedding that took up 80 percent of the seating. Watched well over 20 …More

name: Glenn Wonnacott
text: Same great food as other Mellow Mushrooms with an amazing outdoor deck. The beer selection isn't quite as big as the North Jax location but still pretty darn good.

text: Great spot. Lovely atmosphere. Good for freinds, food, & fun

name: Amanda Mincey
text: Come after 10pm to get a chilled pre outting food load up. Best beers and pizza mashups ever.

text: The bourbon selection is reason alone to come here. The pizza is delicious as well, and there's always good craft beer on tap.

text: Love the pizza and mushroom soup.

text:
I enjoyed watching a football game, as a few colleagues & I had lunch.

name: Sarah Huntley
text: They have GREAT vegetarian options and not just pizza, although there pizza is very good and I appreciate the fact that they have tofu as a topping choice. The Herb Veggie Burger is out of this world and the Avocado Hoagie is also amazing! Yum yum yum yum yum!

name: Aaron Lane
text: Mellow Mushroom is the best pizza place in St. Simons.

name: Vera Gilbert
text: Very nice restaurant! We really enjoyed food and atmosphere. Great service :)

name: Jonathan Godley
text: To Jennifer's review that wasn't a clown that was for the General Managers Father's wedding. They had the porch reserved well ahead of time. You didn't see 20 people walk out because I was there that night. Sorry that you're a whiner and …More

name: Laura McDaniel
text: Little hard to spot from the road with the tiny signage but excellent pizza and pretzels!

text: This the most unique Mellow Mushroom I have experienced. It fits perfectly with the local island vibe and the outdoor deck built around a 300 year old Live Oak tree is something to see.

name: Brandon Miller

name: Violet Miller
text: Great food always great service

name: Jordan Makbu
text: Good food, but it's popular and you'll have a bit of a wait at busy times. We went here for dinner early on a Saturday evening and waited 40 minutes. It's a chain, so you know what to expect. The pizza was great, and they have a decent beer selection.

name: Michael Walker
text:
Great pizza, live music...higher average prices..
Must try the house pizza.

name: JP
text: Located in the Village in downtown  St. Simons Island Ga. It is one of the biggest a d brightest Mellow Mushroom we have been to.  Easy to walk to and the pizza was awesome.

name: Yadibodi
text: If you ever stop here ask for Steve he's an awesome server.

name: Edward Wilson
text: Great place to watch the game and great pizza

name: NONE None
text: We ordered an appetizer that never came. Our waitress later informed us our appetizer never came out because it was burned. Our pizza came out burned as well. We ordered a drink that never came. We have been to several Mellow Mushrooms before and this was our only bad experience. We will not be back to this location.

name: Kellie Karnes
text: Love love love the open design.  The staff is very friendly.  Great food and great atmosphere!

name: Alex R.
text: Man...coming from a bigger city, their happy hour was CHEAP and they had a great beer selection. $1 pretzels (big soft pretzels), $1 meatball, $1 bruschetta is a great set of options! Totally go for it!
